SYSTEM: 05_OWL.pdf: Página 95
© O. Corcho, MC Suárez de Figueroa Baonza
75
OWL 2
Inferring Ontology Class Hierarchy
The ontology can be ‘sent to the reasoner’ to automatically
compute the classification hierarchy.
The ‘manually constructed’ class hierarchy is called the asserted hierarchy.
The class hierarchy that is automatically computed by the reasoner is called the inferred
hierarchy.
Protege 3.4. Pellet 1.5.1
speaker: SYSTEM
